flawed_nl_solution:
He has 10 pairs of shoes and each pair is made of 2 individual shoes for a total of 10*2 = <<10*2=20>>20 shoes
He has already polished 45% of the 20 individual shoes so he has polished 0.45*20 = <<45*0.01*20=9>>9 shoes
He has 20 shoes and has already polished 9 shoes so he has 20-9 = <<20-9=14>>14 more shoes to polish
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
